text: Caprellinoides is a genus of amphipods (commonly known as skeleton shrimps) in the family Caprellidae. == References == * Guerra - Garcia J.M. (2001c). A new species of Caprellinoides (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Phtisicidae) from the Antarctic. Helgoländer Meeresuntersuchungen, 55, pp. 212–220 == External links == * * * Caprellinoides at the World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS) Category:Corophiidea Category:Malacostraca genera
title: Caprellinoides
